title: Heidi Klum Halloween costumes: Jessica Rabbir peeled her skin off
text:
The true queen of Halloween (Picture: Getty/Rex

Heidi Klum is the undisputed queen of Halloween thanks to her costumes that just get better and better every year.

The 46-year-old has been throwing her own Halloween party since 2000, and over the last 19 years, she has pushed the boundaries of dressing up with her out-there costume choices.

From dressing as an ape to riding into the bash on a horse as Lady Godiva, Heidi has done it all – and it’s often pretty painful to have the best Halloween costume of the year.

The model has revealed her Jessica Rabbit prosthetics in 2015 took off some of her skin, as the glue used to create the costume wasn’t exactly easy to peel off.

Heidi truly goes all out (Picture: Jason Merritt/Getty Images)

Speaking to Entertainment Tonight about dressing up as the Who Framed Roger Rabbit? bombshell, Heidi said: ‘It took two hours to take all of that off, because it’s very, very harsh glue that they put on your skin and then they have to put glue remover under it.

‘I mean, I had a little bit here and there where my own skin would come off with it, but I’m always like, “Be careful with my face”.’

Now that’s commitment.

We all have our favourites amongst Heidi’s collection of costumes, but the mum-of-four’s own personal favourite was her transformation into an elderly woman in 2013.

This was a work of art – but it hurt (Picture: Nicholas Hunt/Getty Images for Heidi Klum)

Heidi said: I loved it for myself to see what I’m going to look like, but also because I was turning 40 and people were always saying, “Wow, you’re already 40, you’re really old now. When are you going to stop modelling? When are you going to stop doing what you’re doing?”

‘I’m like, “40 is not old, people! … Like, I should just stay at home and not do anything anymore? I’m going to show you what’s old or how I’m going to be old.” So, that’s how I got that idea.’

We bow down.

Heidi’s favourite was this masterpiece (Picture: Amanda Schwab/Starpix/REX)

Heidi has already dressed up once this year, coating herself in glitter as she attended Paris Hilton’s Halloween bash with husband Tom Kaulitz.

However, after last year’s Shrek and Fiona double act, we have very high hopes for Heidi’s main get-up on Thursday night.

The German star previously teased elements of her costume – having her body computer-mapped, getting a grill fitted and saying it will be difficult to walk in.

We can hardly wait.
